text: On 25 June 2022, two people were killed and 21 more injured in a mass shooting at three places in Oslo, Norway. The shootings are believed to have target Oslo Pride, the local LGBT pride parade. The police is investigating the shootings as an act of Islamic terrorism. A 42-year old naturalised Iranian immigrant was arrested. He has been charged with murder, attempted murder and terrorism. ==References== Category:2022 mass shootings Category:2020s in Norway Category:2020s mass shootings in Europe Category:Crime in Norway 2022 shootings Category:June 2022 events
title: 2022 Oslo shootings
